name: Ace Pilot! (Image Campus)
description:
This game was created during the "Summer Lab 2023" at the educational institute Image Campus.

"Labs" are workshops where students from the different careers and courses offered by the institute, guided and assisted by professors, work together towards a shared goal: developing simple but complete video games within a short period of time.
